Package com.premiereManager.springboot.web.service

Class PremiereManagerService

java.lang.Object
com.premiereManager.springboot.web.service.PremiereManagerService
@Service
public class PremiereManagerService
extends java.lang.Object
Handles requests from the user. Fills the list of premieres with default entries. Enables the user to add, update or delete a premiere from their list.
Author:
Rafal Jagodzinski

    void addPremiere​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String desc, java.util.Date targetDate, java.lang.String type)
    Adds a premiere and iterates variable ++premiereCount in order to create a unique id number.
    void deletePremiere​(int id)
    Deletes a premiere with regards to its id number.

    Retrieves a single entry from the premiere list.

  • Method Details

    • retrievePremieres

      public java.util.List<Premiere> retrievePremieres​(java.lang.String user)
      Retrieves a list of premieres. Entries are checked with regards to the user. If the name of the user is equal to the name provided to the method, it retrieves the list.

    • retrievePremiere

      public Premiere retrievePremiere​(int id)
      Retrieves a single entry from the premiere list. An entry is checked with regards to its id number.
      Parameters:
      id -
      Returns:

    • updatePremiere

      public void updatePremiere​(Premiere premiere)
      Updates an entry, by deleting the old one and replacing it with a new one.

    • addPremiere

      public void addPremiere​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String desc, java.util.Date targetDate, java.lang.String type)
      Adds a premiere and iterates variable ++premiereCount in order to create a unique id number.

    • deletePremiere

      public void deletePremiere​(int id)
      Deletes a premiere with regards to its id number.
